guide.name: Frodo
guide.bio: Frodo was born in Riggins, Idaho and how grown up around these beautiful waters. His favorite activities include spelunking and high-mountain hiking. He enjoys spaghetti and meatballs when he’s back at home. He is friendly and experienced, making your trip both enjoyable and safe.

guide.name: Sam
guide.bio: Sam is from Boise, Idaho, but discovered his passion for white-water rafting here in Riggins. He isn’t afraid to get wet and be involved with the group. When not on an adventure with us, he enjoys long-distance bike rides and grilling steaks and friends and family.

guide.name: Gollum
guide.bio: Gollum got his nickname because of his wiry look and love of the water. River rafting is a perfect fit for him. He is an experienced rock climber and enjoys hunting each fall after river rafting season is done.
